attributes.label: displayed-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: is-clearable
attributes.description: Marks the field as clearable, allowing an icon to delete its content

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Label to describe the radio group

attributes.label: use-portal
attributes.description:
If true, the combobox uses a Stencil portal to create the menu.
Please use this feature carefully, only if needed.

attributes.label: value-field
attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: config
attributes.description:
Data the FLD must parse to fully be configured.
It must be either an Object or a JSON parsable string

attributes.label: data
attributes.description: Effective data to pass to the component

attributes.label: is-button
attributes.description: If true, the ketchup-html takes the shape of a button

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: The label to show when button isButton is active

attributes.label: src
attributes.description: The address which must be referenced by the iframe

attributes.label: is-visible
attributes.description: Specifies if the current portal instance should be displayed or not.

attributes.label: v-nodes
attributes.description: Virtual node list the KetchupPortalInstance must render

attributes.label: is-visible
attributes.description: Tells the portal instance if it can be visible or not

attributes.label: nodes
attributes.description: Virtual node list the KetchupPortalInstance must render

attributes.label: direction
attributes.description: Direction in which the radio elements must be placed

attributes.description: Chooses which field of an item object should be used to create the list and be filtered.

attributes.label: label
attributes.description: Label to describe the radio group

attributes.description: Radio elements value

attributes.description:
The max length of the text field.
